info.name: Document Q&A - Batch Processing Tests
info.description: Test collection for new batch processing functionality - ONE API call for multiple questions

request.description: Tests batch processing with 5 questions about a resume. Uses only 1 API call instead of 5.
Small batch test with 3 basic questions. Uses only 1 API call.

body.raw:
{
    "documents": "D:/document/resume kiran.pdf",
    "questions": [
        "What is the candidate's name and contact information?",
        "What is their highest level of education?",
        "What programming languages do they know?",
        "What frameworks and technologies have they used?",
        "How many years of total work experience do they have?",
        "What projects have they worked on?",
        "What are their key technical skills?",
        "What soft skills do they possess?",
        "What certifications do they have?",
        "What is their career objective or summary?"
    ]
}

request.description: Large batch test with 10 comprehensive questions. Uses only 1 API call instead of 10!
Single question for comparison with batch processing.
